attributes.action: make cyclist to ride in single file.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: when cyclist are riding 2,3 or 4 abreast they are a danger to themselves and other road users. they slow down traffic,make it dangerous to overtake, annoy other road users, do not move over and give way even when a line of vehicles are trying to get past. they do not pay road tax,insurance,fuel cost, mot,licence fees,test fees,toll fees,parking fees,congestion gharges, and any number of fines that go along with owning a car.they contribute nothing to the upkeep of our roads yet ride 2,3, or 4 abreast like they own them. therefore i petition that cyclist ride in single file.
